location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprintDimensions: 660 x 500, on sheet 700 x 540mm

mods.abstract: This blueprint map, showing Bahrain, Qatar, and surrounding areas, is part of the draft oil concession entitled 'The Leased Area. Hawar Isla[n]ds', dated 1939, between Shaikh Sir Hamad bin Isa al Khalifah [Ḥamad bin ‘Īsá Āl Khalīfah], the Ruler of Bahrain, and Petroleum Concessions Limited (folios 97-114).The map states: 'Enlarged in Land Department. Government of Bahrain'.The Leased Area that is the subject of the agreement (around the Hawar group of islands) is shown coloured in red on the map.
